Class CartController

java.lang.Object
com.example.controller.CartController
public class CartController extends Object
Controller class for managing the shopping cart functionality.

  • Field Details

    • lv_cart

      public javafx.scene.control.ListView<MenuItem> lv_cart
      ListView displaying items in the cart.

  • Constructor Details

    • CartController

      public CartController()

  • Method Details

    • placeOrder

      public void placeOrder(MenuItem item)
      Adds a menu item to the cart.
      Parameters:
      item - The menu item to be added to the cart

    • removeOrder

      public void removeOrder()
      Removes the selected item from the cart and updates the total amounts.

    • sendOrder

      public void sendOrder()
      Sends the current order to the OrderController and clears the cart. Displays a confirmation alert after successfully placing the order.

    • refreshCartDisplay

      public void refreshCartDisplay()
      Refreshes the cart display by updating the ListView and other related components. Also updates subtotal, tax, and total amounts using helper methods.

    • setMainController

      public void setMainController(MainController controller, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, javafx.scene.Scene primaryScene)
      Sets the reference to the MainController object, Stage, and Scene. Enables calling public methods in the controller through the provided reference.
      Parameters:
      controller - Reference to the MainController object.
      primaryStage - The primary stage of the application.
      primaryScene - The primary scene to display when navigating back.

    • displayMain

      public void displayMain()
      Navigates back to the main view by setting the primary scene on the stage. Ensures the primary stage is displayed correctly.
